SourceNotes: complete text does not survive; breaks off midway through c. 14
GeneralNotes: These were sent to Innocent IV for confirmation, which he granted. (cf. Leipzig UB MS 1062, fols 35v-36v; cited in Pixton, Watchmen, 432; text in Hartzheim III, 575-77)
ClassificationNotes: issued by AB of Mainz, for Hessian clergy
DatingNotes: dated 1246 in Mansi; 1243 dating in "Fritzlar" by S. Zollo in Dizionario dei Concili, ed. Palazzini, 89; 1244 in Finke, Konzilienstudien
